channel.title: OMGcraft (Small)
channel.description: OMGcraft is your one-stop-shop for everything Minecraft. Discover the big new tips, tricks, and stuff you should know about Minecraft. Hosted by Chad Johnson, this show will make you a Minecraft expert in no time.
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

item.title: Tip: Safe Way to Blaze in Minecraft
item.description:
Host: Chad "OMGchad" Johnson

Blaze rods are important to the potion system in minecraft. Getting them can be hard in the beginning of your game, so here are some tips on how to safely harvest blazes.

For show notes, including links to everything covered, visit http://OMGcraft.com/47/

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/OMGcraftShow

Email us at mail@omgcraft.com

Running time:: 0:10:45
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Host: Chad "OMGchad" Johnson

item.title: OMGcraft 32: Season One Finale
item.description:
How to Make a Minecraft Show

The guys that write the magic of the episodes - cheeto and t2t2 - join chad to talk about how omgcraft happens.

End of Season 1 Fun Time Shenanigans!

Map - Episode 4 of Noxcrew Gameshow mappack

Special thanks to our guests: asim0v, BillMeeks, Brian Brushwood, HonneyPlay, lonelydotgeek, PseudoKnight and Vantes

Season 2!

Read about the changes that will happen starting next week!

Running time:: 0:56:19
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: The season one finale episode is here. Chad talks to Cheeto and T2 about how we created OMGcraft. We play games with the people that have helped with OMGcraft.

item.title: OMGcraft 31: Mail Time! Part 3
item.description:
News!

Minecraft 1.5.1 released, What is Minecraft Realms anyway?, New mob: squiggly blobs in 1.6? Probably not but maybe idk 

Mail Time! Part 3

  • What happened to the aether?

    • It's a mod!

  • Which version of Minecraft would you suggest we buy/use? -- Reid

    • For your situation, xbox.

  • Is OMGchad a real guy? -- Yoni

    • Yes! I am!

  • What's the benefit of launchers?

    • Explained in the episode. Examples, Magic Launcher, and Digiex Launcher

  • An easy way to find cool mods?

    • MinecraftForums, and PlanetMinecraft

  • What are the different types of servers?

    • Explained in the episode.

  • How to censor bad words in my kids' Minecraft client? -- Libby

    • Safechat

  • Can I change skins on Minecraft PE without Jailbreaking?

    • Yes

  • Is Apple no longer going to support Java? Can I still play Minecraft? -- Chumly

    • Java will always work on a computer. Just install it.

  • PsuedoKnight recommends WorldEdit CUI in Episode 26 comments

    • Link

Ending Video

Running time:: 0:49:23
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: On this week's episode of OMGcraft, Chad answers your questions and mail! Check out the changes happening at http://omgcraft.com/changes/ For show notes, including links to everything covered, visit http://OMGcraft.com/31/ Follow us on Twitter: http
item.itunes:summary:
News!
Minecraft 1.5.1 released, What is Minecraft Realms anyway?, New mob: squiggly blobs in 1.6? Probably not but maybe idk Mail Time! Part 3
What happened to the aether?
It's a mod!
Which version of Minecraft would you suggest we buy/use? -- Reid
For your situation, xbox.
Is OMGchad a real guy? -- Yoni
Yes! I am!
What's the benefit of launchers?
Explained in the episode. Examples, Magic Launcher, and Digiex Launcher
An easy way to find cool mods?
MinecraftForums, and PlanetMinecraft
What are the different types of servers?
Explained in the episode.
How to censor bad words in my kids' Minecraft client? -- Libby
Safechat
Can I change skins on Minecraft PE without Jailbreaking?
Yes
Is Apple no longer going to support Java? Can I still play Minecraft? -- Chumly
Java will always work on a computer. Just install it.
PsuedoKnight recommends WorldEdit CUI in Episode 26 comments
Link
Ending Video Running time: 0:49:23

item.title: OMGcraft 29: Time to Grind
item.description:
News!

Dispensers and droppers will now only fire once when they receive a redstone signal. To fire again, the signal must be turned off and on again. (previously any time block gets updated). Reverted bugfix for clouds having transparency above, but not underneath due to performance drop since w04a. Slimes are rarer again.

AND MORE BUGFIXES!

 

Super Hostile #12, Inferno Mines released 

Mob Grinding

Spawners: A monster spawner is only active when a player is within a radius of 16 blocks from the spawner. While the block is active, it will spawn mobs within an 8 × 3 × 8 block area.

Giant box: Must be as dark as possible, reccomended to have water streams to move mobs into right place. (Uses natural spawning). Player must be more than 32+ blocks away

Pistons: Must be dark, player must be 32+ blocks away Can be used as fall trap. Really fast live-death cycle (slower to cap the mobcap).

Grinder blueprint by KaspersMC

Docm's Endermen Grinder

Universal Mob Grinder (with Sorter, Record Farm, Purifier, etc.)

Ending Video

Running time:: 0:42:37
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: On this week's episode, Chad takes you through the ins and outs of mob grinding.
item.itunes:summary:
News!
Dispensers and droppers will now only fire once when they receive a redstone signal. To fire again, the signal must be turned off and on again. (previously any time block gets updated). Reverted bugfix for clouds having transparency above, but not underneath due to performance drop since w04a. Slimes are rarer again. AND MORE BUGFIXES!
Super Hostile #12, Inferno Mines released Mob Grinding Spawners: A monster spawner is only active when a player is within a radius of 16 blocks from the spawner. While the block is active, it will spawn mobs within an 8 × 3 × 8 block area. Giant box: Must be as dark as possible, reccomended to have water streams to move mobs into right place. (Uses natural spawning). Player must be more than 32+ blocks away Pistons: Must be dark, player must be 32+ blocks away Can be used as fall trap. Really fast live-death cycle (slower to cap the mobcap). Grinder blueprint by KaspersMC Docm's Endermen Grinder Universal Mob Grinder (with Sorter, Record Farm, Purifier, etc.) Ending Video Running time: 0:42:37

item.title: OMGcraft 25: Mail Time! Part 2
item.description:
News!

Minecraft Snapshot 13w06a - Mainly bugfixes, but also spawner carts! And yes you can spawn spawners carts.

Data dump from minecraft snooper, also check out the fancy charts by evanoc on reddit.

Maaaaailll saaaaack!

  • Don't try to sleep in nether or the end. Yeah we forgot to mention that last week

  • Use your sword

  • Seeds

  • Where to find mods

  • How do I fix crashing? We have no idea but this could help

  • Command blocks!

  • F1 - F12 on macbooks

Send in your questions! mail@omgcraft.com

Ending video

Anvil Cannon in Minecraft

Running time:: 0:34:10
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)

News!

Don't try to sleep in nether or the end. Yeah we forgot to mention that last week Use your sword Seeds Where to find mods How do I fix crashing? We have no idea but this could help Command blocks! F1 - F12 on macbooks

item.title: OMGcraft 24: A trip to the end
item.description:
News!

Minecraft Snapshot 13w05a:

  • Multiple snow heights

  • Improved lighting on stairs (Doesn't fully fix the "black ceiling" lighting glitch)

  • More scoreboard improvements - Added team mechanics, displaying text under nameplates and criteria "health"

  • Rebalanced bonemeal - Everything now usually takes 2-3 uses to fully grow, but it's random

  • & Fixed bugs!

Bug of the week! [13w05a] Scoreboard Teams function does not accept @p or @r arguments

XBox & Pocket Edition updates

Bukkit 1.4.7-R1.0

Feed The Beast Pack updates & New Packs

Noxcrew Gameshow Reboot Trailer

The End!

Outhouse tutorial:

Running time:: 0:48:49
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: It's time to finish minecraft as we have an adventure to the end. And how much news can we fit into one episode? For show notes, including links to everything covered, visit http://OMGcraft.com/24/ Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/OMGcraftSh
item.itunes:summary:
News!
Minecraft Snapshot 13w05a :
Multiple snow heights Improved lighting on stairs (Doesn't fully fix the "black ceiling" lighting glitch) More scoreboard improvements - Added team mechanics, displaying text under nameplates and criteria "health" Rebalanced bonemeal - Everything now usually takes 2-3 uses to fully grow, but it's random Fixed bugs!
Bug of the week! [13w05a] Scoreboard Teams function does not accept @p or @r arguments XBox Pocket Edition updates Bukkit 1.4.7-R1.0 Feed The Beast Pack updates New Packs Noxcrew Gameshow Reboot Trailer The End! Outhouse tutorial:
Running time: 0:48:49

item.title: OMGcraft 23: TNT Olympics!
item.description:
NEWS!

Snapshot 13w04a is here to stay! Renamed command blocks now show their name in chat messages, bonemeal has been nerfed to further crops by 1 stage per use and smooth doubleslabs are now here to stay as block 43:8 (in fact the whole 8-15 damage value range has been reserved for block sides showing side texture). Also dispensers put on armor now. I don't think you guys understand the importance of it. Seriously. ARMOR! IT GET'S EQUIPPED! Also dispensers and droppers now face in all 6 directions.

In other news hypixel released Zombie Apocalypse. It's the hardest map yet and definitely for 2 players.

OMGCRAFT VS!

Special thanks to Team SGS for competing against us!

Sethbling's TNT Olympics

Running time:: 1:05:13
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: On this episode of OMGcraft, it's Team OMGCRAFT vs Team SGS on SethBling's TNT Olympics! For show notes, including links to everything covered, visit http://OMGcraft.com/23/ Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/OMGcraftShow Subscribe to our
item.itunes:summary:
NEWS!
Snapshot 13w04a is here to stay ! Renamed command blocks now show their name in chat messages, bonemeal has been nerfed to further crops by 1 stage per use and smooth doubleslabs are now here to stay as block 43:8 (in fact the whole 8-15 damage value range has been reserved for block sides showing side texture). Also dispensers put on armor now. I don't think you guys understand the importance of it. Seriously. ARMOR! IT GET'S EQUIPPED! Also dispensers and droppers now face in all 6 directions. In other news hypixel released Zombie Apocalypse . It's the hardest map yet and definitely for 2 players. OMGCRAFT VS! Special thanks to Team SGS for competing against us! Sethbling's TNT Olympics Running time: 1:05:13

item.title: OMGcraft 21: Command Your Blocks!
item.description:
News!

Minecraft Snapshot 13w02a, Activator rail - Blows up TNT minecarts. Mobs can be named by changing the name of the spawning egg in anvil. New texture pack file format and more!

Snapshot 13w02a / 13w02b

OMGcraft Bug of the Week!

Christmas Stats Attack, Mojang redeemed a total of 4,177,843 copies throughout the year.

Command Blocks

  • Warning: Must enable enable-command-block to true in server settings to use in a server

  • Command Blocks are impossible to use, craft, or obtain in Survival. You must get them using the give command. The block ID is 137

  • Executes server commands to the console

  • Use @p (nearest), @r (random), or @a (all) in place of usernamess

    • Example, /give @p 1

  • Teleportation, Give, Weather, Say, Spawnpoint, etc

Ending Video

The crew got christmas gifts, that Chad Opened live on the show.

Running time:: 0:42:21
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.itunes:subtitle: Command Blocks have added a whole new element to the game of Minecraft. Learn how to control and master them!
